instructions: Guess the word in {{tries}} tries. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
correctSpotInstructions: The letter W is in the word and in the correct spot.
wrongSpotInstructions: The letter L is in the word but in the wrong spot.
notInWordInstructions: The letter U is not in the word in any spot.
chainRuleInstructions: From the 2nd guess, a letter chains from your previous guess. The chained letter is auto-filled and locked.
chainPatternInstructions: The chain alternates: right → left → right → left → right, forming a snake pattern.
chainDeadEndInstructions: If the chained letter doesn't match the answer's position, the game ends early.
aboutAuthorSentence: This is an open source word guessing game adapted to {{language}} by <3>{{author}}</3>.
aboutCodeSentence: Check out <1>the original code</1> by <3>Hannah Park</3> or have a look at <5>Aidan Pine's fork</5> and customize it for another language!
aboutDataSentence: The words for this game were sourced from <1>{{wordListSource}}</1>.
aboutOriginalSentence: You can also play the original  <1>here</1>
patchNote_practice_desc:
Play unlimited games with random words.
No more waiting until tomorrow!
Tap the "Practice" button at the bottom of the page to start.
patchNote_settings_desc: A new settings menu is now available from the header.
patchNote_uppercase_desc: Toggle uppercase letters on or off in Settings.
patchNote_donate_desc: If you enjoy the game, consider buying the developer a drink!
